#### Tender Overview
This is a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) through competitive open bidding. The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is acting as the procurement authority on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) for the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA).

The Contracting Authority requires the provision of cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio in accordance with the Statement of Work (Annex A). The services will be provided to the facilities managed by the Department of National Defence (DND) at the following locations:

- Winnipeg, Manitoba
- Manitoba

As part of this procurement, there is an optional teleconference in English on November 14, 2023 at 1:00 PM EST, and in French on November 15, 2023 at 1:00 PM EST. Interested bidders should confirm attendance by November 8, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST.

#### Requirements and Evaluation Criteria
